Been a pleasure reporting from #ierhe and speaking on the media panel. Thanks @GeoffroyGerard & all at IE.
Grayling on plans for NCH regarding overseas students: fees for international students will not be much more than those for domestic #ierhe
Grayling: "over a third of our NCH student are on some kind of financial support." Access very important. #ierhe
Grayling says New College's "aim for our students is to 'pimp their ride'." Give them "bells and whistles" they need to succeed. #ierhe
Grayling: "My students,every week,do research,write an essay,meet with a tutor to discuss the essay." Gives "in-depth understanding" #ierhe
Grayling: Felt there "should be an institution dedicated to the study of humanities at a very high level." Seemed important to me. #ierhe
Grayling: Setting up New College of Humanities "I had 2 things on my side: enthusiasm and ignorance." #ierhe
RT @gonzalezfmario: "Now that you know that you have no idea what you are talking about, we can make progress" Socrates. Great keynote by @…
Grayling: "Thoughtful reading, attentive reading, is in itself an education." (Related article: https://t.co/kw9KByfzHz)  #ierhe
Grayling: "Literature is hundreds of windows into other lives, other ways, other choices" #ierhe
Grayling: "History is our greatest resource for reflection on things as they are now." #ierhe
Grayling: It is "precisely the point of the #humanities" to allow people to "see the world with lights switched on". #ierhe
